statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-2 \, x^{3} + x^{2} + 5 \, x + 2 , 2 \, x^{3} - 5 \, x^{2} + 3 \, x + 5 , 5 \, x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2} - x - 6 , 10 \, x^{3} - 13 \, x^{2} - 9 \, x + 4 , 5 \, x^{3} - 6 \, x^{2} + x - 3\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
